    • Uses of Board in fko.chessly.game

      Classes in fko.chessly.game that implement Board 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BoardImpl
      The board class has all the information regarding an actual current Chessly board like stones the fields, who is next player, etc..
      It also knows if castle is still possible and knows about possible en passant.

    • Uses of Board in fko.chessly.player

      Methods in fko.chessly.player that return Board 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected Board AbstractPlayer.getCurBoard()
      Returns the current board for which the player shall find a move.
      The current board is set by getNextMove().
      Methods in fko.chessly.player with parameters of type Board 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Move Player.getNextMove(Board board)
      return next move
      Move AbstractPlayer.getNextMove(Board board)
      Return next move by waiting for a move given by the player thread in run().
      This is usually called from a game object when it is this player's turn.
      It sets the player's status to Player.THINKING and waits for a move (Player.HAS_MOVE) through calling waitForState(Player.HAS_MOVE).
